features.service: Responsive Customer Service via Phone, Email, and WhatsApp
features.experience: Decades of experience in supplying projects, industrial suppliers, etc.

testimonials.reviewLeonard: A place to find all kinds of bolts, concrete nails, dynabolts, of various sizes, very complete and affordable. Fast, friendly, and professional service.
testimonials.reviewRay: The items are quite complete. Can be purchased retail & wholesale. All the shopkeepers are alert & fast üëç ‚Ä¶
testimonials.reviewAbraham: A place to find all kinds of bolts and screws that is complete and cheap.. Prices for wholesale and retail depend on qty.. Many other bolt shops in Bandung source from this place..

jmarketPage.emptyMessage: No categories are available at this time.

contactPage.description: Sinar Terang (ST) is present as a supplier of fastener products for construction, automotive, furniture and manufacturing, as well as equipment and tools for building materials in West Java and Indonesia with an established, complete, fast service and flexible prices.

purchasingPage.about_desc: Sinar Terang is a trusted distributor specializing in the supply of construction fasteners and hardware. We serve wholesale needs for high-quality bolts, nuts, screws, and building components with international standards.
purchasingPage.experience_desc: With three decades of dedication, we have built a reputation as a leading hardware distributor. Our commitment to quality and partner satisfaction is the foundation of long-term success.
purchasingPage.partnership_desc: As a professional supplier, we have been trusted by various leading construction and industrial companies. A strong partnership network is proof of our credibility and service quality.
purchasingPage.partners_desc: Trusted by leading companies in the construction and manufacturing industries
purchasingPage.contact_us_desc: Interested in becoming an Investor or Partner? Contact us via social media or scan the QR code below to connect directly:
purchasingPage.contact_us_scan: Scan QR Code to contact us
purchasingPage.contact_purchasing_desc: Join our network of trusted partners and achieve sustainable business growth

careerPage.hero_desc: We are always looking for talented and passionate individuals to grow with us. Let's build a better future together.
careerPage.no_jobs_title: There are currently no job vacancies available.
careerPage.no_jobs_desc: Keep an eye on this page for updates.
